AT.name: 101 Pony Pets 3D
AT.description: Was ist noch besser, als einen Hund als Haustier zu haben? Dein eigenes Pony! 101 Pony Pets 3D verschafft dir ein Pony als Freund zum Versorgen, Trainieren, Spielen und Liebhaben, alles in beeindruckendem 3D. Wähle eines von über 101 lustigen Ponys – oder adoptiere sie einfach alle. Spiele mit deinem Pony im Park oder bringe ihm das Tanzen, Hüpfen und Fliegen bei. Belohne dein Haustier nach jedem Kunststück mit einem Leckerli. Nimm mit deinem Pony an Heimtierausstellungen teil, gewinne Spielzeuge, Futter, Kleidung und Möbel und verschönere so dein Haustier mit Hüten, Brillen, Hemden und mehr. Schau dir dein Pony durch Heran- und Herauszoomen, durch Kippen und Drehen in echtem 3D ganz aus der Nähe an. Spiele unterhaltsame Minispiele, während du mit deinem Pony einen Routinebesuch beim Tierarzt machst, ihm ein Bad gibst oder im Garten herumtollst. Mit mehr als 101 Pony-Freunden zum Pflegen, Verwöhnen, Spielen und Liebhaben kommt niemals Langeweile auf.

BG.name: 101 Pony Pets 3D
BG.description: What's even more fun than a puppy for a pet? Your very own pony! With 101 Pony Pets 3D, you can have a pony friend to care for, teach, play with and love, all in amazing 3D. Choose from over 101 entertaining ponies—or simply adopt them all! Play a game of fetch in the park or teach your pony to dance, jump and fly. Reward your pet with a treat after each trick! Enter your pony into pet shows to earn toys, food, clothing and furniture, then dress up your pet with hats, glasses, shirts and more. Watch your pony up close and personal, as you zoom in, zoom out, tilt and rotate in real 3D. Enjoy fun minigames as you take your pony to the vet for checkups, give it a bath, romp in the yard and more. You'll never be bored with over 101 pony friends to groom, pamper, play with and love!

BE.name: 101 Pony Pets 3D
BE.description: Qu'est-ce qu'il y a de plus sympa qu'un chiot de compagnie ? Votre propre poney ! Avec 101 Pony Pets 3D, vous pourrez chouchouter votre poney, lui enseigner plein de choses, jouer avec lui et le câliner à souhait, le tout en 3D. Choisissez parmi plus de 101 poneys ou adoptez-les tous ! Lancez-lui la balle dans un parc ou apprenez-lui à danser, à sauter ou à voler. Récompensez-le après chaque exercice ! Faites-le participer à des concours pour gagner des jouets, de la nourriture, des vêtements et des meubles, avant de lui offrir des chapeaux, des lunettes, des t-shirts... Observez-le de près, zoomez d'avant en arrière, inclinez et pivotez en véritable 3D. Amusez-vous avec les mini-jeux chez le vétérinaire pour sa consultation obligatoire, donnez-lui un bain, roulez-vous dans l'herbe ensemble. Vous n'êtes pas près de vous ennuyer avec plus de 101 poneys à dorloter, cajoler et adorer !

ES.name: 101 Pony Pets 3D
ES.description: ¿Hay alguna mascota más divertida que un perrito? Sí, ¡tu propio poni! Con 101 Pony Pets 3D, tendrás un amiguito poni al que podrás cuidar, enseñarle cosas, jugar con él y quererlo, con increíbles gráficos en 3D. Elige el tuyo entre más de 101 divertidos ponis —¡o adóptalos a todos!—. Juega con tu poni a lanzar cosas en el parque para que te las traiga o enséñale a bailar, saltar y volar. ¡Dale una golosina cada vez que haga algún truco! Inscribe a tu poni en exposiciones de mascotas para ganar juguetes, comida, ropa y muebles, y luego vístelo con sombreros, gafas, camisas y muchas cosas más. Contempla a tu poni desde todos los ángulos acercando, alejando, inclinando y girando la cámara en auténtico 3D. Juega a divertidos minijuegos, como la visita al veterinario, el baño, las cabriolas en el jardín y muchos más. Con más de 101 amiguitos poni a los que puedes acicalar, mimar, jugar con ellos y quererlos, ¡no podrás aburrirte!

FI.name: 101 Pony Pets 3D

IT.name: 101 Pony Pets 3D
IT.description: Cosa c'è di più divertente di un cucciolo? Il tuo cucciolo di pony personale! Con 101 Pony Pets 3D potrai avere un pony per amico: coccolalo e giocaci assieme con tanto affetto in un fantastico ambiente 3D. Scegli tra più di 101 divertentissimi pony o adottali tutti! Gioca con lui nel parco, tira un oggetto e te lo riporterà, oppure insegnagli a ballare, saltare e volare. E dopo ogni gioco, dagli un premio come ricompensa! Fai partecipare il tuo pony a concorsi per cuccioli per vincere giocattoli, vestiti e accessori, poi vestilo con cappelli, magliette e altro ancora. Osserva il tuo pony da vicino in un ambiente 3D dove potrai zoomare, inclinare e ruotare la visuale a piacimento. Divertiti con dei mini-giochi spassosi: porta il pony dal veterinario, fagli il bagno, fallo giocare in giardino, e molto altro ancora. Non avrai mai tempo di annoiarti con 101 amici pony da spazzolare, coccolare e con cui giocare!

LT.name: 101 Pony Pets 3D
LT.description: What's even more fun than a puppy for a pet? Your very own pony! With 101 Pony Pets 3D, you can have a pony friend to care for, teach, play with and love, all in amazing 3D. NL.name: 101 Pony Pets 3D
NL.description: Wat is er nog leuker dan een puppy als huisdier? Je eigen pony! Met 101 Pony Pets 3D heb je je eigen ponyvriendje om te verzorgen, mee te spelen, kunstjes te leren en van te houden, allemaal in prachtig 3D. Kies uit meer dan 101 mooie pony's—of adopteer ze gewoon allemaal! Speel een spelletje apporteren in het park, of leer je pony dansen, springen en vliegen. Beloon je pony na elk kunstje met een lekkernij! Laat je pony meedoen aan shows om speeltjes, eten, kleding en meubels te verdienen en kleed je pony dan aan met hoedjes, brillen, shirts en meer. Bekijk je pony van heel dichtbij als je inzoomt, uitzoomt, kantelt en draait in levensecht 3D. Speel leuke minigames als je je pony ter controle naar de dierenarts stuurt, een bad geeft, laat draven en meer. Je hoeft je nooit te vervelen met meer dan 101 ponyvriendjes om te aaien, verzorgen, lief te hebben en mee te spelen!

PL.name: 101 Pony Pets 3D
PL.description: What's even more fun than a puppy for a pet? Your very own pony! With 101 Pony Pets 3D, you can have a pony friend to care for, teach, play with and love, all in amazing 3D. Choose from over 101 entertaining ponies—or simply adopt them all! Play a game of fetch in the park or teach your pony to dance, jump and fly. Reward your pet with a treat after each trick! Enter your pony into pet shows to earn toys, food, clothing and furniture, then dress up your pet with hats, glasses, shirts and more. Watch your pony up close and personal, as you zoom in, zoom out, tilt and rotate in real 3D. Enjoy fun minigames as you take your pony to the vet for checkups, give it a bath, romp in the yard and more. You'll never be bored with over 101 pony friends to groom, pamper, play with and love!

PT.name: 101 Pony Pets 3D
PT.description: O que é ainda mais divertido do que um filhote de cachorro para um animal de estimação? Seu próprio pônei! com 101 Pony animais em 3D, você pode ter um pônei amigo para cuidar, ensinar, brincar com e amor, tudo em 3D incrível. Escolha entre mais de 101 divertido pôneis, ou simplesmente adotar todas elas! Jogar um jogo de buscar no parque ou ensinar o seu pônei para dançar, pular e voar. Recompense seu animal de estimação com um tratamento após cada truque! Digite o seu pônei em pet mostra de ganhar brinquedos, alimentos, roupas e móveis, em seguida, vestir-se seu animal de estimação com chapéus, óculos, camisas e mais. Assista o seu pônei de perto e pessoal, como você aumenta o zoom, zoom out, inclinar e girar em 3D real. Divirta-se minigames como você levar o seu pônei para ao veterinário para exames, dar-lhe um banho, brincar no quintal e muito mais. Você nunca vai ficar entediado com mais de 101 amigos de pônei para noivo, mimar, jogo com e do amor!

RU.name: 101 Pony Pets 3D
RU.description: Что еще более интересно, чем щенка для домашнего животного? Ваш собственный пони! с 101 Пони Животные 3D, вы можете иметьa пони друга по уходу за, учить, играть с и любовь, все в удивительный 3D. Выбирайте из более чем 101 развлекательных пони-или просто принять их всех! Поиграйте в выборку в парке или научить пони танцевать, прыгать и летать. Награда вашего питомца с удовольствием после каждый трюк! Введите пони в домашнее животное Выставки зарабатывать игрушки, продукты питания, одежда и мебель, то одеваться вашего питомца с шапки, очки, рубашки и многое другое. Следите за пони и близко личный, как вы увеличить, уменьшить, наклонить и повернуть в реальном 3D. Наслаждайтесь удовольствие мини-игры, как вы собираетесь работать с пони theВетеринар для проверок, дать ему ванну, колесят во дворе и более. Вы никогда не будете скучать с более 101 пони друзья жениха, побаловать, спектакль с и любовь!

SE.name: 101 Pony Pets 3D
SE.description: What's even more fun than a puppy for a pet? Your very own pony! With 101 Pony Pets 3D, you can have a pony friend to care for, teach, play with and love, all in amazing 3D. SK.description: What's even more fun than a puppy for a pet? Your very own pony! With 101 Pony Pets 3D, you can have a pony friend to care for, teach, play with and love, all in amazing 3D. Choose from over 101 entertaining ponies—or simply adopt them all! Play a game of fetch in the park or teach your pony to dance, jump and fly. Reward your pet with a treat after each trick! Enter your pony into pet shows to earn toys, food, clothing and furniture, then dress up your pet with hats, glasses, shirts and more. Watch your pony up close and personal, as you zoom in, zoom out, tilt and rotate in real 3D. Enjoy fun minigames as you take your pony to the vet for checkups, give it a bath, romp in the yard and more. You'll never be bored with over 101 pony friends to groom, pamper, play with and love!
